mean_cn: n. 年长，资历深，职位高
mean_en: the fact of being older or of a higher rank than others; the rank that you have in a company because of the length of time you have worked there
sentence: People usually bow to seniority to show their respect.
sentence_trans: 人们通常向长辈鞠躬表示尊敬。
word_etyma: senior老 + ity名词后缀 → seniority年长
